name: Greg the Time Fish
description:
INPUTS ARE: ARROW UP/DOWN AND SPACEBAR

Not fully finished. just 1 boss. was fun anyway :)

Idea was a fish who wants to become an eternal god so he searches the cosmos for gods of time to slay. But since hes a goldfish he can only remember 1 skill every few seconds. Didnt implement enemy behavior :) so you cant die. hf
